file_content.text: Thank you again.
My children are safe. Thank you. It is only a matter of time before Taris is theirs and theirs alone.
We can't let the Republic wipe out the rakghouls.
My lord, you must stop them. They are about to destroy my precious children.
My lord, the Emperor smile on you. You must stop them. They are hurting my children!
Agent of the Empire's machinations. Do your work. Dismantle the cruel Republic minions who've taken my children.
Hunter. Save my children. I will pay you well.
Friend, ally. Save my children. Please, you must help me.
What's happened to your children?
Your children?
My children. My beautiful rakghouls. The children of all Sith.
You're babbling.
I must?
Who else will help them? Who else will help my precious rakghouls?
Those marvelous, precious creatures. The Sith created them, and Darth Malak gave them this beautiful kingdom in which to multiply and grow strong!
But now the Republic is trying to steal Taris from them and destroy them! We must protect them.
You really are Sith, aren't you?
I should've expected crazy.
We are the Empire, and the rakghouls are our children. Taris is their birthright!
You were talking about a job?
You said something about pay?
Yes, a job. Protect the rakghouls.
People call me crazy, but even I don't like rakghouls that much.
You're nuts.
But you must protect them.
I'm not about to let the Republic reclaim Taris.
The Republic will die.
Good, good. It's simple, then.
I'm on it.
The cruel Doctor Vernan leads the Republic's experiments to eliminate the rakghouls. Destroy his equipment! Wipe out his research! Kill him!
No, thank you. [Refuse quest]
You must reconsider. You mustn't let the foul Republic and their cruel Doctor Vernan destroy the rakghouls!
I'm sorry. I don't have time for this.
